en-AU.summary: Find local events in New Zealand
examplePhrases: What's on in Auckland this Friday?
Find me jazz events in Wellington next week
en-AU.name: thelocal
en-AU.description:
Curious about what events are on in New Zealand? Ask this skill what’s on in your city and it will find you upcoming concert, gigs, exhibitions, festivals, sports events, workshops and more. 
This skill was developed with support from Blind and Low Vision NZ and Eventfinda. 
While in the skill you can 
Search by a New Zealand town, city or venue (e.g., Nelson) 
Search by a time or date (e.g., this weekend) 
Search by an event type (e.g., concerts) 
Get more details about an event 
Bookmark events you’re interested in 
Listen to the tutorial again (say tutorial) 
Say cancel or stop to exit

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: 'Reset database' and 'Skip tutorial' are available as utterances for testing
